scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/reports/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cy:run_process: npm run prereport && cypress run --browser chrome --env username=$DBS_USERNAME,password=$DBS_PASSWORD  --spec 'cypress/e2e/tests/Login/loginTest.cy.js,cypress/e2e/tests/SalesInvoice/salesInvoiceTest.cy.js,cypress/e2e/tests/Configuration/Others/Promotion/*.cy.js'
scripts.cy:run_processWithReport: npm run prereport && cypress run --env username=$DBS_USERNAME,password=$DBS_PASSWORD,baseUrl=$DBS_URL --browser chrome --spec 'cypress/e2e/ÃŸtests/SalesInvoice/salesInvoiceTest.cy.js';npm run junit:merge; npm run mochawesome:merge
